event.title: corporate training companies in chennai
event.description: Are you looking for the best Corporate Training in Chennai?, then FITA is the right place for corporate training. FITA focuses on professional development by improving skills and enhancing performance. Employers utilize training to acclimate new employees, teach current employees new skills for the same job, and to advance employees into jobs requiring different skill sets. FITA Infotech Pvt Limited is a dynamic IT and Training company founded by IT veterans with many decades of industry experience. Whether you need your team to be trained on traditional technologies like .Net, Java, Testing or niche technologies like Salesforce or Hadoop, FITA is the one-stop place for your corporate training needs.
event.address: 37F Velachery Main Road, Velachery,  Chennai - 600042 Tamil Nadu Next to Adyar Ananda Bhavan
